trussoptimizater.Analysis
Class FrameAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      trussoptimizater.Analysis.FrameAnalyzer

public class FrameAnalyzer
extends java.util.Observable

This class will analyze a truss using the direct stiffness method and calculate the following

  • Nodal Deflections
  • Bar Axial Forces
  • Bar Moments
  • Bar Shear Forces
  • Support Reaction

It does this by executing the following procdeure

  • Calculate local stiffness matrices for all bars
  • Construct a gloabl stiffness matrix from all the local stiffness matrix
  • Calculate Global Force vector
  • Solve the following equation to find unknown displacements F = ku,

    where F - Global Force Vector

    k - Gloabl Force Vector

    u - Displacement vector

  • Post process displacement values to find axials forces, support reaction etc

isStructureAnalzable

public boolean isStructureAnalzable(TrussModel truss)
returns true if the the following conditions are met

  • The structure must be continous and rigid - TO DO
  • No isolated nodes
  • All bars must be assigned section sizes
  • The structure must be stable ie supports.size() >0

getArrayofRowsToKeep

public int[] getArrayofRowsToKeep(TrussModel truss)
Returns an array of rows and columns that should be used to calculate unknown displacements. All rows and columns that correspond to fixed support conditions ie 0 displacement should be deleted.

Parameters:
truss -
Returns:
an array of rows and columns that should be kept for solving unknowns
